title: Time Now to Gather

lyrics.text:
Time now to gather, Time now to feel Christ's holy presence gracing this meal.
Grain from the harvest fruit of the vine; simple the supper, sacred the sign.

Time to remember Christ who was sent. Time to say thank you for all he meant.
Come to this table. Come, without fear. God will forgive you, welcome you here.

All who are hungry, come, and be fed. Serve one another this cup and bread.
All who are troubled, hurting, or sad, come, and find healing. Come, and be glad!

author: Mary Nelson Keithahn
